tosdr.tldr: LinkedIn sets and uses cookies on your computer. This gives LinkedIn both identifiable (when you are signed in) and anonymous (when you are signed out) forms of information about you, your preferences and behaviour. You can choose to reject all cookies in your browser but this may prevent you from using LinkedIn services they require you to sign in.
